website_summaries.verdict: A bold print of the world map for your walls.
pros: Comes in several color options to go with your decor
that is durable and dries quickly
Versatile tapestry can be used outdoors as well
cons: The smaller tapestry doesn't include the entire world map

customer_reviews.title: Picture was a mirror image
customer_reviews.text: Was a mirror image of the world map. Very disappointed. Currently in the process of returning it and getting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Bcares297

customer_reviews.title: Item not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Just opened my World Map Tapestry & it is a complete MIRROR IMAGE of the map. Extremely disappointed. I will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this map tapestry, it was shipped fast and the colors were accurate. Looks great! I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Family

customer_reviews.title: Yellow tint—not white
customer_reviews.text: Thin fabric, but artwork as pictured. Just know that the “white” background is not at all white... kind of has a yellow tint to it. We ended up framing it to help disguise the odd shade.
customer_reviews.author: sassy senorita

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: This tapestry was perfect for what we needed. It’s a nice light weight and looks great. It was a little long for our wall so we did have to cut a little off the bottom but we still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lexee_D

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Of all the tapestries I've bought, I feel this one has been the most worth it. The material is thin but I prefer thjs be when hanging as it make it's easier to lay flat. If this is what you're also looking for, get this. Just grab a steamer, hang it up and once the creases are gone, it'll look great. 18 bucks to add a new level of design to my space? Absolutely yes.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Nice, put it in my living room above my ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice, put it in my living room above my couch to add a little warmth to the space. In a rental, it can be hard to decorate without damaging the walls! I wish it was a little more defined though, as some people who come in don't know what it is at first -- the wall could just be dirty.
customer_reviews.author: mamiealabama

customer_reviews.title: Where in the World am I? Don’t Use This Map to Find Out!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 0 stars I would. I am very disappointed with it. It was printed wrong. I attached a picture. It’s difficult to understand what I mean by the fact that it’s reversed. Looking at the United States, Florida is on the left, instead of the right. It is only printed on one side so I can’t just flip it over. I can't even send it back for a refund. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Abby W.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is cute and I will use it but the fabric is like a picnic cloth for a table. Mine was wrinkled so I threw it in the wash and then the dryer. The lines never came out. A bit disappointing because I really want to hang it on my wall
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Light and billowy, great deal
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I thought, my mistake. Beautiful patterns, some mildly distorted spots. It is surprisingly lightweight and actually kind of like an imitation silk. Excellent as a billowy window cover or wall art.
customer_reviews.author: Karl McDougal

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome value for the money, it gave my room a perfect touch without spending a ton of money on decoration. It covered almost my whole wall!! If you are hesitating take this as the sign to buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Keirstyn M

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: The tapestry is smaller than expected and the quality of it is very think. I used pins to hold it up and because it’s so thin it looks like if you pull it will rip. It’s also not an exact rectangle but instead it stretches in weird directions so if you’re a perfectionist this isn’t the one.
customer_reviews.author: _annaaa

customer_reviews.title: It hangs beautifully on my wall but I can't see any of the polynesian islands.
customer_reviews.text: I feel bad for my polynesian friends. Im assuming this map is accurate post global warming however its cute and my baby cant stop staring at the vivid colors.
customer_reviews.author: Sancamps

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what our plain wall at the top of our stairs needed! It hung well and didn’t wrinkle when being tacked up. All the continents and countries are exactly where and what they should be.
customer_reviews.author: Kate V.

customer_reviews.title: great college dorm tapestry!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color, size and how lightweight the tapestry is. It’s perfect for my college dorm. Perhaps the only drawback is that the tapestry is kinda flimsy, but perhaps that’s due to how lightweight it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Strong study design, looks great on my wall, no issues with shipment, hope to purchase more
customer_reviews.author: Samuel J. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality great price
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be a Christmas gift... I am considering starting a fight so I can hang it in my living room
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Green

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I got the grey and white world map tapestry for my dorm room and I absolutely love it. It did not come mirror reflected or anything. It adds great character and a homey feel to my room! I 100% would recommend it to anyone who wants to add to their room! Looks really cute with fairy lights hung above/around it.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Carreon

customer_reviews.title: Thin but good
customer_reviews.text: So for what it is and the price it’s okay. It came folded and the fold marks are still there even after a year of owning it. Still looks really nice in my room and definitely would recommend if you want it.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Arevalo

customer_reviews.title: So pretty in my library!
customer_reviews.text: This tapestry is very pretty! Exactly the same as the picture and it large. Kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mountain.family

customer_reviews.title: Color is off
customer_reviews.text: The color of the tapestry was very wrong on the one I received, you could hardly see the continents because it was almost the same color as the background. Thinking I got a faulty one? Returned mine due to color, but the tapestry was a nice material and felt very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Just fine
customer_reviews.text: I think mine is missing New Zealand other than that it’s cute and just what i expected
customer_reviews.author: Pink

customer_reviews.title: it's thin and light so it's easy to hang as well
customer_reviews.text: This came exactly as it was pictured and it fits my wall just as I wanted, it's thin and light so it's easy to hang as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yellowish-green and dingy
customer_reviews.text: This would have been perfect, but the color is awful! Its a yellow green dingy color. I posted a picture of it up against a white sheet for reference. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kassidy Hadley

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my stairway to lower level of my home and I think it’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: Judy Vee

customer_reviews.title: Bad material
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality of material and the edges were rounded but it’s ok but definetly not like picture
customer_reviews.author: Adalie Bofinger

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty nice. The design is a little blurred in some spots, but I still like it. Can't find Hawaii though.
customer_reviews.author: Amber L.T .

customer_reviews.title: Love how the colors pop! Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great colors that pop and a great conversation piece <3 Thin material but you can’t tell once it’s hung on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Karmawann

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR MY DAUGHTERS DORM ROOM
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted something to cover her plain white walls when she went to college, and she loves all things related to travel. This covered the entire length of the wall behind her bed, and then some.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Sooo it wasnt as detailed as expected. but it was worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Shoppingaddict

customer_reviews.title: ... a little more yellow-ish compared to picture but I like it! Got a lot of compliments since I ...
customer_reviews.text: Color a little more yellow-ish compared to picture but I like it! Got a lot of compliments since I put it up in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Joan B.

customer_reviews.title: Great tapestry
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! Product as described. Great for a teens room or classroom!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: It's nothing extraordinary, but it's super cute and exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Brynna German

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! The colors are true to the pictures! The fabric is a little stiff at first but it hangs well.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Park

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute for the office! The map is a tad off proportion and not all 100% correct but it's very cute and goes perfectly in my office!
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: I thought the floral areas would be a different fabric ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought the floral areas would be a different fabric stitched onto the tapestry. Not as cute as i thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and small
customer_reviews.text: For just going up as decoration, it works fine. The material is very thin and scratchy. The image is good and portrays watercolor. I expected it to be bigger than it came but...
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great design and great size
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and better! Great quality and design.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Nice wall decor
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for a boys room. I fills a not so perfect wall. It adds interest. It’s educational.
customer_reviews.author: Tayler cole

customer_reviews.title: would look nice if printed right
customer_reviews.text: have this tapestry hanging in my dorm and it looks so nice but the only problem is that it is a mirror image. very annoying and unhappy though it does make for a good laugh when other people come over
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Martin

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: love love love but had a little bit of a mint green tint to it but didn’t care bc it still works w my room
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Compliments well
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tapestry, only downfall was in some parts of the picture quality it looks grainy. Overall I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons room. He absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for such an inexpensive product
customer_reviews.text: Way bigger than I expected. Very good quality for such an inexpensive product. To provide a comparison, I got the 59x81 size and it is about the length of an extra large twin size bed. Very impressed with the product. Very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Not Karen

customer_reviews.title: colorful and very very large
customer_reviews.text: tapestry is HUGE!! I did not realize that it is not color coded to be accurate on the different countries but is still colorful and beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Celia Baker

customer_reviews.title: Could be better material
customer_reviews.text: Could be worse as well. It is very thin but I still have it hanging
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Bussell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wall art
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for a wall hanging in my daughter’s room. It was exactly what she wanted. It’s lovely and we are completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: joy day

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! We love these tapestries. They make a boring room pop!!
customer_reviews.author: SB81

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any airy decorated room.
customer_reviews.text: This tapestry gave my whole wall a makeover. Love the detail and colors!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Howell

customer_reviews.title: Fabric quality or design style?
customer_reviews.text: Cute print. Nice price. The fabric is a little rough. U get what you pay for. Happy purchase in general.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 1007

customer_reviews.title: Neat design!
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice in a spare room and takes up a whole wall above bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: off white
customer_reviews.text: the color isn’t white like shown in the photo, but still looks great and good size.
customer_reviews.author: ailene corey

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Not as white as the picture but fits well on the wall. Great design and size
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Colorful
customer_reviews.text: It’s not too big. The colors & designs are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley lowery

customer_reviews.title: exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Love this muted US map. Thin fabric, soft and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle N

customer_reviews.title: Grey and cream
customer_reviews.text: The picture that is folded is the most accurate for color. No true black, all shades of grey.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Newman

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dorm Walls
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to cover up my dorm's wall, because it felt so empty and less homey. However, when I put this on the wall it transformed the space! Great buy, worth every penny! The gray color scheme is awesome! It looks like water colors and looks even better in person! Can easily be hung up with those velcro command strips! No damage to the wall and the sticky part actually sticks to the fabric!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MIRROR IMAGE
customer_reviews.text: I want my money back. Least you can do is have a consistent product with a correctly produced world map.
customer_reviews.author: Cammie McGillis

customer_reviews.title: Feels like it was screen printed on a plastic table cloth
customer_reviews.text: Not tapestry material at all. Feels like it was screen printed on a plastic table cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I put this tapestry behind my bed on the wall. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sel

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret it
customer_reviews.text: I got the biggest size (70”x92”) for a corner in my dorm room, and I love it. I used 3 pairs of Command Large Picture Hanging Strips to hang it on the wall. You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: NU

customer_reviews.title: love love love
customer_reviews.text: it looks so amazing and i love it so much. very nice quality
customer_reviews.author: K. Holthouse

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and color, just missing holes to hang it. However, I added some using a gromit kit.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the material and the design! Will definitely be ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: Jennicka runyon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a Christmas gift to my daughter and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i love this map!!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great in my office and shows up well in my videos.
customer_reviews.author: Wevin1

customer_reviews.title: Great if you don’t mind it being backwards
customer_reviews.text: Printed backwards. Wasn’t able to easily contact seller. Was supposed to be for a classroom, so totally not appropriate!
customer_reviews.author: SMuggi Nola

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tapestry to put above my daughter's crib. It looks exactly like the picture and turned out really nice. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gena Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, just not my style
customer_reviews.text: I can't put my finger on why I don't like this but it's probably just personal preference. The tapestry itself is good quality which is why I gave it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tcherkez

customer_reviews.title: Nice tapestry
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price, but it's missing New Zealand which is pictured in the description and very important to me.
customer_reviews.author: jessika

customer_reviews.title: It pops on my purple wall perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I love the design! It's happy and quirky and fits in perfectly with my room! The color matches the picture online and I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Studjo

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!!!!! So pretty & the material is awesome. No. It is not super thick. I can't wait to hang it up. Very vintage looking & so unique. Best purchase so far from Amazon & I have purchased a lot!
customer_reviews.author: LVlivin

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what you would want.
customer_reviews.text: The material is like a thin plastic with screen print on it- not what I imagined based on the description. The colors are bold, but I bought the larger size and I think lines are not as crisp on the patterns. I thought this was going to be more cloth material, but I think it will still work to hang on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: works great and isn’t to heavy. I hung it up with tacks and it stays up
customer_reviews.author: Fury5.0

customer_reviews.title: material is thin but it is colorful and fun.
customer_reviews.text: great size and colors for he perfect place I wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: Dahmen P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice dorm room addition.
customer_reviews.text: Slightly out of square but nice overall. Unique and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: NR

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is super nice! It looks so good on my daughters wall. The colors are really bright and vibrant. I really love this tapestry.
customer_reviews.author: tracy d fields

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly as pictured and is made of great fabric for wall hangings
customer_reviews.text: I hung mine up in my massage room. It's exactly as pictured and is made of great fabric for wall hangings.
customer_reviews.author: ToryJ

customer_reviews.title: It's ok...
customer_reviews.text: The material is poly and it's a screen print. Not really what I was going for, but it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than expected but still really nice. I think I'll order the bigger one soon.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for covering walls
customer_reviews.text: BIG size, perfect for covering walls, or office cubicles. This is the topic of conversations.
customer_reviews.author: Asusena

customer_reviews.title: love this map
customer_reviews.text: love this map! many different fabrics for the different countrys, fun to look at. perfect for an empty wall or behind your bed. came nice and folded in a little bag, and wasn't wrinkly at all. the material is very light and thin. highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alexia D. Hohol

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter hung this in her room and she loves it!!

customer_reviews.title: our daughter loves it...... ...
customer_reviews.text: our daughter loves it.........thought it would be a true woven tapestry......felt misled by the description a bit, but still likes it a lot

customer_reviews.title: Wall decoration
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for granddaughter and she really liked it.

customer_reviews.title: This tapestry is super cute, my only complaint is the pattern print ...
customer_reviews.text: This tapestry is super cute, my only complaint is the pattern print on the tapestry does not line up with the map layout it is on.

customer_reviews.title: Adorbs!
customer_reviews.text: This tapestry is super cute and is really great material.

customer_reviews.title: but looks very nice against my daughter's wall in her bedroom
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is very thin, but looks very nice against my daughter's wall in her bedroom.

product_meta.title: BLEUM CADE Icejazz Watercolor World Map Tapestry Multi Splatter Abstract Painting Wall Hanging Art for Living Room Bedroom Dorm Home Decor 59X51 Inches
product_meta.description:
Color:Multicolor| Size:51"x59"

This world map tapestry colorful tapestry can be used for a wall hanging, a table cloth, a bedspread, Bedding , Bed cover, picnic blanket, beach towel, yoga mat, sofa cover, couch cover, furniture throw, curtains, altar cloth, hung from the ceiling, home decor, and more.

It brings a different level of enthusiasm to the atmosphere.

FEATURES: 
Featuring vivid colors and crisp lines, these highly unique and versatile world map tapestries are durable enough for both indoor and outdoor use. 
It's not too flimsy - The material is solid, the edges are finished, it isn't too thick or thin (though I suppose that depends what you want to use it for). 
It is a great size, and looks great on bedroom or dorm room wall!

ATTENTION PLEASE: 
Please note that slight color difference should be acceptable due to the light and screen. 
Dry Cleaning Or Cold Water

 Wash Washing Instructions: 
Wash in Cold Water. 
Hands washed. 
Machine-washable; 
Do not use chlorine bleach.

PACKAGED INCLUDED: 
1 Piece BLEUM CADE Icejazz World Map Tapestry.

CLICK THE YELLOW 'ADD TO CART' BUTTON ABOVE to send it to your family, friends, guests. It absolutely will become the best gift what they receive.
feature_bullets: High Quality Material: Made of micro-fiber peach, this world map tapestry is soft and durable enough for wall decoration. More importantly, its pattern is clear, fashionable and its color doesn’t fade.
Four Distinct Sizes: 51.2ʺ × 59.1ʺ / 130cm × 150cm, 59.1ʺ × 59.1ʺ/ 150cm × 150cm, 59.1ʺ × 82.7ʺ / 150cm × 210cm, 70.9ʺ × 92.5ʺ / 180cm × 235cm. You can buy them according to what you need.

Unique Pattern: Unique world map design shows oriental style. So attractive, amazing and original! It’s hard to find enough superlatives to describe its elegance. It absolutely makes your room vintage.
Versatile Tapestry: It can serve as a tablecloth, bedspread, curtain, beach cloth. Moreover, it can be used to decorate the walls of your living-room and bedroom.

PERFECT GIFT FOR FAMILY OR FRIENDS: If you are still wondering to choose a gift for the incoming holidays, this tarot tapestry will be a nice choice. With all these characteristics, this one is surely a meaningful present for anyone on any occasions or holidays.
